movie.title: Excursion
movie.plot: In the late eighties, the USSR government enlists Tomas, a devoted member of the Communist Party, to travel back in time to future London and document how Socialism has thrived.

events.title: the Chernobyl reactors are run at full power, causing a meltdown and closing all time loops
